name: Railway Company Owner
description:
Cities are building transportation routes across cities and suburbs. You are a railway company owner that tries to make the best routes possible for cross city travel. But remember! You work for the city, and you have a deadline to make the tracks because people are waiting for a cross city public transportation.

Game Flow
● Players will start the game and play or load a save file
● Player will start the tutorial as soon as the player starts a new game.
● Players must build train tracks to reach the main station of a city.
● Each track can be edited again but if destroyed it will only refund some of the money. So, players must carefully plan ahead
● Reach the final station of the last city and enjoy your work.
